title: New transaction

account.title: Details
account.feesInfos: Select a higher fee to have your transaction confirmed faster.

note.title: Comments
note.noteDesc: Comments are optional. They allow you to add details on the transaction.

confirmation.title: Confirmation
confirmation.desc: A transaction request will be sent to the members of the account. It won't be broadcasted to the blockchain until it's approved.

noRuleMatched: Rules defined in the account don't allow you to send this amount and/or to send funds to this recipient.
finishDesc: Your request to create a transaction has been submitted for approval.
